customer.name: My mom
customer.comment: used to get this order from them then they quit. She would like to start getting it again. The last time she went to the store, she had to buy 6 pack Old Golds because they were cheaper than Dorals and she had no coupons. She was not happy.
customer.address: Here is her address: 5 W. Union, Aftoa, Iowa, 50330

family.comment: My entire family smokes Dorals but lately we are having to buy a cheaper brand. We don't like the other brands as much as Doral.
